content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were just sitting out side enjoying the beautiful evening.  when at 9.32pm we saw this bright green fireball in the sky.    

we noticed the object at about an elevation of about 85 degrees, and it continued until it passed the horizon. 

if it was a meteor, we never heard any crash and we didn't see anything on the news about it today.  also, the magnitude (brightness) of the object never wavered.

we are long time astronomy fans, and we have seen many meteors. at the same time, we've never seen a green meteor (made of copper?)  we were also both were surprised about how slow the object seemed to move.  i'd compare it to the speed of a single engine prop plane, at an altitude of 1000-1500 feet up.

the object was about the size of a pencil eraser at a arms length.

i made a little diagram of what we saw...The dotted green line represent the path of the object.
content.summary: Slow moving green fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my computer downloading a game when i looked out my window to see if that birght green light in the sky was there (ive seen it before) and turns out it was , accept this time there was more then one of them there was like 10 of them and 4 of them were forming this kind of upside down 3 dimensional pyramid that was moving slowly if at all because after a while i could only see half of it as i live in an apartment and some house was blocking the rest of it. the lights were really high in the sky and they got really really bright and then they got dimmer but they never stopped shining they just got really hard to see, not the pyramid ones but the other 6 around it and one of them was over the formation it was larger then all of them and glowing bright orange i saw all of this at 9:30 and it lasted til about 11:30 then all of them dissapeared except for one. it just sat there for a half hour and then i decided to stop watching it and when i came back it was gone. i tried taking pictures but for some reason the lights wouldnt show up on my digital camera i pointed it in there direction but nothing happend the street light popped up and in 3 pictures i dont no im not to sure what i got its very strange it dosent look like what i could see with my eyes but when i took the picture it was there one of them is a tiny red light that you can see moving rapidly in two pictures i took simultaneously after the other. the other is a bright blue blob and i think i messed the other ones up because of the way i was shacking i dont no but i was very anxious when it happend and my heart was beating really fast and i could not calm down i thaught it was a tower they use to make sure planes dont get to low but they were to high up in the sky and they moved i also thaught maybe its a bunch of satelites but they dont glow bright green and they dont stay still when u watch them u you can see them move. i can assure you what i saw just sat there in place, and now there gone. and they only come back some nights its weird, oh and they arent stars unless stars get bright and fade and all the other stars in the universe blew up because there wasnt a star out yesterday night, only a alot of glowing lights..
content.summary: Glowing lights going dimmer and brighter..Everywhere

content.detailedDescription:
Walked outside for a cigarette, looked in the sky and saw dancing lights....
i first saw one light, it looked like it was in one spot and then moved quickly to a different point in an erratic manner. we watched it for some time, it would move up when planes were in the area, it also looked like it did some loops. it would move quite a bit in different directions but basically stay in a (defined) area. it looked like it could be a star, but obviously too low to be a star. it moved back to where we first saw it then moved quickly to where it looked like it was in the middle of the street, that is when we saw the other light. it was smaller and stayed below the original light. the lights were white, there were no other colors and no flashing light to indicate a plane. at one point while we were standing on greenbrier a lady stopped and asked if we had seen the 5 lights,she said a few of her neighbors had watched the lights for a while before we saw them, she said there were 5 originally, then it one fell and seemed to explode at greenbrier and sims, but they could not find anything on the ground. at one point of the night it appeared to follow my friend and i to the gas station and back to our house. every once and awhile i would go outside and check to see if it they were still there and they were, at about three am i walked outside and walked to were the lady said the light exploded at and i walked under the lights the were about from my point of view about 50' apart from each other but that's from my point of view underneath and i walked back home. about the time i had to go to work at five ten in the morning they were still there i continued to go to work when i came back at a few hours later there was no sign of them at all.
content.summary: Dancing lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were apending the night in the family cabin...We came outside when we saw a blue light...The light stayed in the sky for approx. 5 mins...We couldnt detect where it came from because of the mtn.S...But we felt the presence of something "not" right...Afterwards time had lapsed the we couldnt account for...
content.summary: Saw a long blue flash.

content.detailedDescription: (this happed at 12:15am on 3/31/10 - your form doesn't seem to want to accept the time i inserted).  ever since my sighting last summer, i scan the sky whenever possible looking for more, so.....  went outside to let my dog do his thing before retiring to bed and saw what at first appeared to be a star low on the horizon wsw of me over the rio rancho area of w. albuquerque which is west of road "528" where the suburb density drops wanes off into desert.  this star was very bright and no other stars were in the vicinity (it's a full moon), and even though it didn't have faa flashing lights, i still figured it was an oncoming plane's lights or something and didn't pay particular attention to it. about 2-3 minutes later, i looked again and noticed that the "plane" not only hadn't moved at all, but the bright white light had now changed to red, so i ran inside to get my binoculars (7x50).  through the binoculars, i saw what appeared to be a large "v" shape hanging in the air pulsing red-green-red-green.  rt 528 is about 15 miles from me as the crow flies and at first this thing appeared huge, but in the 15 minutes i watched it, it leveled out - still pulsing red-green until it drifted west to the point where i could no longer see it with the naked eye, but could still see it with the binoculars, and then in a few minutes it got so far away it was gone. anybody traveling south on 528, which goes n/s, must have seen this thing as it's size was considerable, so i'm hoping for a corresponding report.
content.summary: Sphere morphed into triangle over w. albuquerque/rio rancho.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking northeast from i-69 and 96th street a star was blinkimg in a strange manner due to light pollution i am sure. there was a streak across the sky but had no light just a shadow. i did a double take. it was an obvious craft moving in a way never seen by me like a pac man but against the light. never seen anything like it and i wish my blackberry had better camera/video.
content.summary: Looking at sky, saw object pass across lights/stars

content.detailedDescription:
I am sending a photo of a ufo.  it was disguised as a small floating burn cinder that may have come from a neighbors bbq grill.  i notice the burn cinder in my ny backyard. however, 10 minutes later the cinder did not move from the last place i saw it. therefore, i slowly move the camcorder toward the middle of my back yard. it accelerated at a high speed. i cough it as it disappeared into the clouds.

i was in california for the january 2009 winter as i opened the garage door i looked into the back yard and saw three identical craft similar to the one in the photo, take-off.  i was not surprised that the crafts were in my backyard but that they opened a dimensional door that was in contrast with the topography in california and with the 4:00 pm sky. hours later i turned to my daughter and asked her if she had  seen something strange.  she was afraid to be ridiculed but related 

the 2nd picture is similar to the ufo depicted approaching the space station orbiting earth as seen on the tv show: los archivos de jaime mausan. [reference sep 2006 atlantic mission sts-115, dec 2006 mission sts 116 & mission sts 117]. in  february 2003 there was communication with a similar  looking ufo.

the 3rd picture is the similar face that appeared in a uk crop-circles depicting a humanoid face comparing their dna structure to that of  homo-sapient sapient. their was telepathic communication letting me know that they had achieved terra forming technology. 

what relationship and responsibility do these third parties in the section "witness notice and election for release of contact information" have with mufon?
content.summary: Photos clips from video.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend just called me a bit ago, reporting a sighting of a ufo as she was unloading her car this evening. she says a craft of immense size was hovering over her apartment buildings. this is the 2nd encounter with crafts in her area in 2 weeks! the first sightings weren't as close to her apartments, but they're getting close! she says the craft was about 2 trucks in width. it hovered then took off. the craft was triangle with lights just as she saw before.
content.summary: Ufo "imense" in size hovering and flying past apartment buildings

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in backyard, looking for squirrels in a large oak tree.  caught 3 silver shiny disc shape objects in formation overhead going due north, fast.  could see that they were silver in color reflecting on the left side, they traveled 30 degrees from the horizon changed formation,but continued together;  that's when the reflection from the sun was more apparent.  a second or two after they changed formation, they headed due west toward the gulf, after which my view was obstructed due to trees, etc.  came in thru the house out the garage to see more of them but they were gone.  i am 48 years old and have never seen anything like that -- and i don't do drugs! there was also no com trail, no sound, but they were high.  did not have any other object to compare to for scale -- hard to judge how big the objects were or at what alttitude they may have been at.
content.summary: 3 disc shape objects  going north and west, sarasota, fl

content.detailedDescription: Well its been a few months since i've last reported these but we saw it 3 seperate times tonight in the same exact part of the sky over a 45 minute period. would come out very bright orange-ish color then quickly fade out. nothin much more to add ..
content.summary: Orange/amber lights in the sky again

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting at a traffic light in franklin, tn 2004 and i saw a streak of light 1st go down and then shoot into the sky. it was like a check mark if you will. it was so fast i barely saw it. i didnt say anything to my wife as i thought she would say i was crazy. but, she said to me... "did you see that light?" i was like you saw it too?! so, we both saw a flash of light like a streak go down and then shoot up to into the sky. it was like a shooting star, but going up instead of down. it just vanishedd! i actually told my wife that were were going to see if we can find it again, she was oddly ok with the idea. we drove all around the area where the light was over and we saw nothing. i still wonder what it was we saw to this day......
content.summary: A shooting star going up not down

content.detailedDescription: I was driving. turned off of hwy 101 south onto alabama hwy heading into rome. i saw what i thought was a bright star and as i got closer it got brighter. i then realized that it was cloudy and that there were no other stars around. i focused on the light that was stationary and it brightened then turned off... immediately i saw a red light on the left side and a green light on the right side. i knew that there was a rr crossing up ahead and assumed it was a train, however when i arrived at the rr crossing the was no train but instead an almost sperical object floating about 3 yrds past the crossing and about 30foot in the sky. i immediately called my husband in tears bc i knew that what i was seeing wasn't "right". i was crying in fear when i told him what i was looking at. i passed directly under the object and could see there circular shaped on the bottom. i pulled over into the old coosa middle school parking lot in an effort to take a pic?Video with my camera phone. there were no lights on the back side and by time i could get my window down it shot off toward the mountains were it turned around again to where the red and green light were showing then with a flash it was gone. i am still creeped out and afraid to drive home from work tonight!
content.summary: Sighted a bright glow which turned to one red one green light  30-40foot above road

content.detailedDescription:
Look they sent me an easyer bunny...You can barely see his ears..

1st bunny rabbit...The mist is forming a bunny


 2nd photo...Since easter this week ...How bout some big plump colored orbs..With happy faces on them, picture taken... a bove a church...I have a lot of these photos and this is one of my  favorite photo..


  

 3rd photo...The bee-et is watching me...But i got his picture again..Lol
     i been practice-ing there language ...Check it out buzzbuzzbizzzbizzzzzzzzzzz...Lol ...Happy easter to mufon

 
 oh and im rejoining mufon today...And im going to re-send my investigators test that i took again today in...I keep forgetting to 
send it in...Happy easter [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Look they sent me an easyer bunny...

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading home from a friends house in sanford, maine at around 7:00 pm on rt 202 (also called lebanon rd). when i got to the top of mt. hope and was turning with the road towards the west at a short downhill grade,what looked like a large cluster of lights to my left caught my attention. i've been on this road countless times and never had any kind of experience like this. i think the reason it caught my attention because of the size of this thing.I was probably around 1-3 miles away and it looked to be around 4 inches tall and three inches across. there were alot of lights on this thing but they all looked to be separated by some distance. there was a center mass that had sections coming off of it in multiple directions,much like the space station. it didn't seem to move as i drove along. it reminded me of the way the ufo's in the movie "independence day" just seemed to float. i was a distance from this thing so i didn't hear any noise. i drove approximately a mile in a westerly direction and as the road turned to the left and downhill in a southerly direction i couldn't see the object anymore. it was gone!!
i'm not quite sure what to think about this, but i sure wish i had had a camera.
content.summary: I saw strangely configured lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on interstate 72 & talking with my husband on the phone.  a few miles before the hull/payson exit, i looked over to my right and saw an object hovering over a field.  it appeared to be disk shaped based on what appeared to be clearly defined red, blue and white lights.  i told my husband i was going to pull over and try to take a photo.  i stared at the hovering object for a minute and fumbled with my cell phone trying to get a picture.  the object flew straight up and then flew over my vehicle and to the southeast.  i put my window down to listen and to attempt to take a photo.  i didn't think anything would show up in the photo since it was so dark out in the country and was now so far away, but when i looked at the photo there was a round white light in the picture.  i heard a loud sound like that of a plane plus some other sound that i had never heard before.  when i pulled over on the right, i believe my car was the only one in sight for several minutes.  after the object flew over to the southeast, a delivery truck went by me.  it was very strange.  the object did not appear to move until after i pulled over and was sitting there looking at it.  i thought it was strange to see red, blue and white lights all at the same time on an object that appeared to be disk shaped and staying in one place.  it did not appear that the object was that high off the ground.
content.summary: Hovering object with red, blue and white lights flew straight up and then sw of my car.

content.detailedDescription: On june 2, 2009 at approximately 3:00 pm  i was sitting on my balcony which i do often, looking toward the north (i can view the entire sky over las vegas and my balcony is partially covered so i can sit outside during summer) i witnessed the most unbelievable, most incredible object that i have ever seen in my life.   from out of my left peripheral vision i noticed what i thought was an airplane traveling from west to east.  when i turned my head to the left i saw a giant metallic tube (bright silver) that resembled a giant airplane without wings and without a definitive fuselage or tail.  as i watched this object travel eastward i was able to see the sun shine(reflect) along the side of this object.   as i watched in awe the object slowed and then came to a complete stop right in front of my viewpoint.   there was no wind (i had area rugs hung over my balcony which would sway even in slight wind)  and there were no clouds in the sky, it was a perfectly blue sky.   as this object sat there still (for about 15 seconds) i watched in disbelief as this object's sides began to shrink inward making the object smaller and smaller (shorter and shorter tube) until it became a small point that completely disappeared  in front of my eyes.   this object was completely silent and was moving at a very fast velocity before coming to a complete stop in a matter of seconds.  the entire incident lasted maybe 40 seconds.  the object was extremely high in the sky (i had to tilt my head all the way back to see it) but it was easily visible due to its great size.   i have been watching airplanes all my life and this was no airplane.  i estimate this object must have been the size of at least 10 jumbo-jets.  i have been skeptical about this topic and a non believer in ufos.  this incident has completely changed my life and i feel my mind has expanded 100 fold.
content.summary: Gigantic metal tube cylindrical/ cigar-like

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 2nd time i've seen these lights.  i wouldn't have filed a report but i did a quick search for ohio and recent sightings and found more than one news story, in particular from euclid, ohio, that match what i've been seeing exactly.

the lights at first glance appear to be plane or helicopter lights.  in fact, the first time i saw them, i didn't even give them a second look.  that was on march 23 at approximately 11:30pm.  i only thought it was something strange when i went out later that evening at 12:30am and saw the same lights in about the same position.  i watched them for quite awhile and attempted to video tape them (which i do have), but the tape only reveals fuzzy lights so it's not worth much.  

the lights stayed there for another 30 minutes until my curiosity got the better of me so i got into my car and drove toward them as best as i could.  as i left town, i seemed to be getting closer to the lights and they were actually closer than i initially thought since they didn't in line with the stars and horizon as a distant object would.  just as i noticed i was getting closer, that's all the closer i was able to get.  in fact, the lights moved relatively quickly away from me toward the east.  i tried driving as fast as i could to catch up and drove about 60 - 70 mpg for about 10 minutes and could not catch up.  i turned around and the lights were gone a few minutes later.

the lights i saw tonight (the 29th) were exactly the same lights.  the difference is that i saw them to the northwest of columbus grove instead of the east (march 23).  i watched the lights for more than an hour and tried video taping them but again, the video camera couldn't get a good focused video.  i tried using the 60x zoom on it and a couple times i did get a clear glimpse, but the lights just appeared as , well, lights.

the lights were white and blue.  truly, i would have thought they were helicopter lights but they hovered in approximately the same spot for hours and there was no noise at all.  i didn't want to waste gas so i didn't chase them this time.

again, the euclid sighting seems to match what i saw exactly.
content.summary: Bright lights in sky, hovering about 5 miles n-nw of columbus grove.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting madonna's website and watching a video of her performing "give it to me" at an outdoor concert in st. petersburg, russia, on aug. 2, 2009.  at the beginning of the video, you can tell from one of the shots that the sun has set and it's almost completely dark.  when the video hits the 1 minute 38 second mark, the camera suddenly pans away from the stage (did the camera man see them?) and is pointed to the horizon where there are 8 orbs hanging in the sky (too high and still to be camera flashes coming from the crowd), and if you watch closely you'll see 2 more orbs come from the middle of the screen and cross the other orbs at record speed in a right to left direction.  interestingly, a few months ago, i found a video on youtube showing a bright orb watching a concert given in mid-day (i think it was springsteen performing).  so, madonna 8 orbs and springsteen 1 orb.  i guess they showed up to watch the hardest working earth-woman in showbusiness.
content.summary: 8+ orbs watching madonna concert

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony, looking up at the sky, as i usually do.  i've always figured that most people don't see ufos because most people don't look up at the sky.  i've done this for most of my life and have only ever seen a ufo twice (this occasion being only the second).

in any case, just as i looked up, nearly directly overhead, i saw a very brilliant flash that grew more luminous over a period of about 5 seconds.  it was moving, but not very rapidly, even as the light was intensifying, and appeared to be much higher than any passenger airplane flies.  from my perspective, it appeared to move at about 1 cm per second.  the light was bright white and grew in intensity until it was about as bright as a full moon on a clear night, but only a small fraction of its size.  while it was brightly luminescent, it appeared about 10 times as large as the largest star in the sky and equally as bright (ten times as bright as the brightest star in the sky).  after it reached its climax in intensity, it faded to a luminescence equivalent to about that of the average star's intensity.  it continued to move toward the south, but appeared to ascend to an elevation well beyond that of a commercial aircraft, and did so much more quickly than anything i've seen in the sky.  as it ascended and continued southward, it faded progressively.  just before it faded out of sight, it made a sharp ~10��� turn to the left and then faded from view after about another 10 seconds.  the entire incident endured for about 45 seconds.  while it moved more rapidly than anything i've ever seen in the sky (taking into account its apparent elevation), it didn't move like a bullet or take-off so rapidly that i'd have missed it if i'd blinked, as i've heard described in so many other testimonies.  very exciting and, although it was much too far away to see any details, i'm, personally, convinced that what i saw was a ufo that was, also, of extraterrestrial origin (both terms used in their literally/denotatively).
content.summary: Very bright illumination and sharp turning ufo

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 5 minutes till midnight, i stepped outside with my small dogs.  the sky was clear, stars plentiful, a beautiful evening.

i called one of my dogs back to me but he was interested in something in our driveway, so i walked out away from the house and that is when i saw an orange colored light to my northwest, traveling east.

the object suddenly stopped and remained still. it was now located a few degrees west of due north and perhaps 5 degrees above the horizon. it never moved from that position, which was probably close to being directly over crystal falls.

at first i thought it might be an emergency helicopter, as we are not quite a half mile from the local hospital.  it only took a few seconds to be sure that it was not.

after watching for a few minutes, i ran inside and told my spouse, "you need to see this!"

i grabbed my binoculars, flung open our front door and pointed.  he saw it.  he grabbed my binoculars but they were set for me, so he grabbed the other set of binoculars and looked again.  we discussed it and agreed we were seeing the same thing.

the light would be a deep red, then it would change to a brilliant orange, then brighten even more, to a yellow white.  every time i spoke out loud that it should come closer, or get brighter, it would flash brightly, then it would dim to red again.
what we saw was an horizontally elongated light, with something bright hanging down from the bottom center, like a narrow "v".  as we watched, i began to be able to see a slight outline of an object, that the light was attached to (see depiction).  the light was mounted to some type of structure.

seen from our perspective and without aid, the light was approximately 3 times the magnitude of venus at it's closest to earth.  the light appeared to be several miles away, yet through the binoculars it was fairly large.  after being able to see a faint outline of the object that the light was attached to, i'd have to say the object in total, was massive.

i took several photos with my small digital camera and watched the object for slightly over an hour.At approximately 01:06, as my spouse and i watched, the light flared up to several times it's original size, then as if by flipping a switch, the entire object disappeared.

we both stayed awake until 03:00 but the object did not return. 

i have had many sightings but this is only the second time that my spouse and i have witnessed something like this together.

from my perspective, the object (light) flared brightly and disappeared, while my spouse thinks it exploded, then disintegrated.  whatever it was, we both watched it for over an hour before it disappeared in a flash.

note:  this is my own personal sighting.  photos were taken only seconds apart.   depiction shows how the structure appeared, as i viewed it through my binoculars. 

my spouse and i are in agreement about the 'appendage' appearing to protrude from top and bottom of the light, though he had trouble making out the structure around it.
-sw
content.summary: Brilliant red/orange light seen by two witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
My eyes were closed, i had been asleep.  not for very long because i had been up late that night and went to sleep around 1:30 or close to 2:00. i could see a light flashing ... flicking off and on.  i knew i was awake but couldn't open my eyes.  how was that light flashing in my bedroom? that's when i thought that they were here. i became very frightened and i could hear my heart pounding in my ears. then i feel this awful feeling going through my body.  it was like an electrical shock that lasted for some seconds with a slight vibration. i was thinking i had felt this feeling before.  for some reason i knew this was not a natural feeling and yet i thought this was something "i" was doing myself. i tried to scream..  open my eyes.. but i couldn't  i took note of my surroundings. i was in bed.  the covers where over me and i was lying on my side facing the bedroom door.  the cat was on top of the covers laying next to me and was very still.  everything was quiet in the house and the feeling had passed.  i think they were gone but i could not open my eyes or move yet.  for some reason i started to feel very relaxed and very calm.  i could feel my heart rate slow and i felt a feeling of tranquility.  my head cleared of all worries and thoughts of what had just took place.  i drifted off to sleep and did not wake till the next morning, remembering all that i have just described.  
i have seen objects in the sky that i can't explain and have several "dreams" of encounters with strange beings.  i don't like thinking about them.  this is the most recent event that i would like to share with you in hopes that i may find some kind of release....Understanding...To these feelings of helplessness, anger and fear.
content.summary: I did not see anything.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the passenger deck of the queen of saltspring, island ferry, as it traveled southbound from saltspring island to swartz bay, north of victoria, b.C.

using binoculars, i was following a pair of cormorants darting about one-another, one-hundred yards east of the boat. they appeared to be at a height of between seventy and one-hundred feet above the ocean water. i then saw what appeared to be an extremely bright, circular blob, of mercury/chrome light, above them and further east. 

i describe it as a blob because the light resembled a blob of mercury undulating very slightly, from oval to round. and chrome, because it resembled the bright, shiny bluish surface of freshly polished chrome. i would say that it appeared to be about three-kilometers in distance (there are small islands dotting the region) and it was clearly between our ferry and morseby island further east at thirty to forty degrees above the horizon.

my very first impression was, that it was the landing light of an aircraft on approach to victoria international airport, to the south/west of our position. the light then immediately changed its shape to that of a long cigar shape. my first impression was, that it was three-hundred feet in length. now, its shading appeared to be like brushed aluminum similar to that used in the skin of passenger aircraft. it no longer glowed like the light from before, and it was clearly, a three-dimensional object. i thought, it's an airliner on approach to sydney's nearby, victoria international airport. but, it just couldn't be, it lacked wings, windows, and notably, it had no tail section. it was, for all intents and purposes, an aluminum cigar tube suspended in the sky.

seeking additional witnesses, i turned to the couple nearby and asked "do you see that?", and then quickly turned back to look at the object. to my dismay and great disappointment, it was gone. the nearby, single engine, otter float plane, that was near to it but farther away, was still in evidence, but the ball and tube were no where to be seen. my fellow passengers asked me what i had been referring to, and all i could do was mumble something about, how much fun the birds were having today. 

i continued to search the sky for anything matching its description but saw nothing else. the float plane continued on, toward vancouver island. i walked the passenger deck listening to my other passengers conversations, hoping to hear mention of the object. nothing. .  

after arriving at swartz bay, i stopped and made a call to harbour air, at coal harbour, vancouver. i spoke with their go-to guy and he said that the float plane i had seen might have been one of theirs, but none of their pilots had reported anything unusual. he had enough personal interest to put in a call to the pilot of the last plane to arrive in victoria. i waited and eventually was told that nothing had changed. 

i remember thinking to myself, someone new i had seen the object and that they were embarrassed my seeing it.

i let it go and thought nothing of it until, i inadvertently watched a podcast called, "dan ackroyd, unplugged on ufo's". during the  podcast they aired footage taken in venice, california, in 2004. during the podcast i recognized the very same characteristics of light and motion as appeared in the circular object i first noted, on august 2nd, 2007.
content.summary: Bright crome/mercury circle light in daytime sky

content.detailedDescription:
I must have been 13 at the time. i was in the passenger seat of my mother's minivan, driving home on a1a. i don't believe my little brother or sister were with me, but my mom was. as we were driving home, in the later hours of rush hour, i noticed 9 white lights pretty close to the ground. the lights seemed to form three triangles, 3 lights per triangle at the tips. the triangles seemed to just hover above the hightway for everyone to see. being dark, you could barely make out the craft, but surrounding lights helped a bit. both me and my mom are largely skeptic and the both of us are atheist, so my mom passed it off as something explainable, but i was transfixed. we eventually passed it on our way home, and i never saw the lights since.
 two or three years later, i learned about the belgian triangle incident. the craft seen was largely similar to the ones i had seen, and the habits of the craft reported were the same. both seemed to hover slowly and over large numbers of people. i am not sure what it was, and i have considered the possibility that it was a blimp of some sort, or a sattelite, but none of the blimps common to the area during tpc golf season(the approximate time of the event) emitted lights in that arrangement and the lights were too close to belong to a sattelite i assume. so maybe it's a type of aircraft? i'm not ready to go ahead and say it's of alien origin, because i'm not a believer of extraterrestrial visitation, although i'm open to the possibility if enough evidence ever comes forth and i do believe in extraterrestrial life in some shape or form in the universe. the question of what i saw has eaten at me for four years now, and after finding this site, i decided to document it here. i know it's been too long since the event for an investigation of any sort, but i decided that it would be good to at least share my experience.
content.summary: 3 silent hovering triangles, each sporting three lights at the tips.

content.detailedDescription: Unidentified disks in picture. did not know they were on picture until i  downloaded into my computer. the screen on my camera was to small to see then. nothing on prior or after pictures.
content.summary: Two disks over loudon, tn christmas day 2009

content.detailedDescription: The blue book version of his sighting is very limited. my father was a fighter pilot stationed on guam when he had his sighting while flying on mission and made the report. his report is very lengthy so i would appreciate a call from someone if you are interested in the rest of his story. he told us on numerous occasions when prompted by his sons of his sighting with much more detail than the blue book version suggests. if you want an accurate accounting of what he really saw please call anytime. he is now deceased but i would like to see his full story out in the open.
content.summary: I would like to add information to the blue book registered sighting by lt. ted brunson

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of saturday, march 27th, i was facing west sitting on my balcony here in banker's hill, san diego, ca at 8:30 pm pst.  through the trees i saw a flash of white light which streaked from the west to the east resembling a meteor streak, but more close.  i got up off my chair and looked directly above our condominium.  i then saw the underbelly shadow of something smoothly gliding to the south. it was barely detectable, but with the bright moonlit sky i clearly saw wingtips.  i don't believe it made any sound, but it was hard to tell since we live near an airport and there was an incoming plane arriving in the flight path to the airport.  the entire sighting lasted no longer than 10 seconds.  i am an avid sky watcher and this was not a normal event.  the plane was completely dark aside from the flash of light it emitted which drew my attention to it.  it reminded me of batman's batplane.  perhaps a drone plane of some sort taking a photo.  i did watch for from the roof our building for the next 45 minutes and it did not return.
content.summary: Unlit silent winged aircraft flashed meteor-like streak of light

content.detailedDescription: On the opening day of a monona grove high school football game i walked through the admision and looked up.  i saw what looked and behaved like a shooting star.  it came from left to right, appeared like a star and disappeared just before the tree line, like a shooting star might.  i would say shooting star was what i saw except 2 factors 1. it was at a football game with lights and all that and that would make it hard to see a shooting star.  i will however give credit that if you go near where the players have practice behind the bleachers you can see the stars.  2. i watched many shooting stars 2 nights in a row just before the sighting. they are hard to see with many lights.  which reminds me we saw what we thought were airplanes chasing each other and probly what it was but thats another story.  call me crazy and just making up it was a ufo and not a shooting star but i stand behind my experience, and will back it up.
content.summary: Ufo that looks like shooting star darts through lit up sky at hs football game.
